    • Method Detail

      • handleGet

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> handleGet(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> obj)
                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Converting individual data (each Object in obj) to Object. Each Controller in ZerLi_Server will implement it.
        Parameters:
        obj - is array list that contains the "cells" of the Result (By ResultSet) from the Data Base
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the parsed data that asked to SELECT
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • add

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> add(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> arr)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Will add the object to the DataBase
        Parameters:
        arr - always will contain 2 Objects: The first one (get(0)) is the Object to add to the DataBase (Depend on the Controller) The second one (get(1)) is Boolean that indicates if we want to get the new Object's id
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains the answer: if the Boolean=true, will contain the BigInteger id else, will contain true
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • update

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> update(java.lang.Object obj)
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Will update the Object by it's Primary Key in DataBase.
        Parameters:
        obj - the Object to update in DataBase.
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains true when success.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
